thread.title: Guest Shopper 46960

author: Guest Shopper 46960
title: Guest Shopper 46960
text: We ordered a liter of the Black Maxx Dye Ink. The bottle was different from the photo on the website so I called to verify that it was the correct product. As always the customer service was impeccable. The tech I spoke to was very helpful researched the issue and assured me it was correct all within a matter of minutes. We are very happy with Ryonet and trust them fully with our business.
